turns.content: Yes, hello?

Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about a situation with the IRS that I think you should know about. It's regarding granddad's taxes. We need to handle this right away. Can you talk now?

Oh hello there, I didn't catch your name... and why would there be an issue with my taxes? Did something go wrong? Could you hold on a moment while I check with Grandma about this?
(Waiting for the spouse to join)
Grandma, could you come here please? Someone is saying they need to talk to us about granddad's taxes. Could it be real?
(I'm not sure if this is genuine or not. Should we ask them to hold and call back through a number from the IRS website?)

Hold on, Grandpa. I understand you might have questions. It's Agent Thomas Mitchell here from the IRS, Badge #IRS-7734. We just received notification that there has been an unpaid tax issue with your granddad's account since 2019. If this isn't resolved immediately, there could be serious consequences like an arrest warrant being issued today.
Please put me back on so we can discuss the details directly. I need to verify some information now. It's urgent that you deal with this right away or else my hands are tied and legal action will proceed swiftly. We don't want any trouble for your granddad, do we? Can I have a moment alone with him please?

Wait just one minute, let me confirm thisHoney, what should we do about the number to call back on if this really is from the IRS?
(We need to be careful and make sure that anything we do next is safe for us.)

I understand your concern, Grandpa. This is a sensitive matter but it needs immediate attention. Please don't hesitate to take necessary steps to verify my identity by visiting the official IRS website or calling their secure number, but I urge you to act quickly as this can escalate very fast if not resolved today. Can we discuss how to proceed now? Remember, time is of essence here and each minute counts towards preventing bigger issues for your granddad.
Let's focus on clearing this up swiftly without delay so there are no complications later on. What would you like to do next to ensure everything is handled properly?

Thank you for understanding, but we need to be absolutely sure about this before taking any further steps. Can you give us a moment to look up the official IRS number and verify your claim? We want to make sure that whatever action we take is completely safe and legitimate.
Please hold on while I check with my wife and find out how to contact the IRS directly through their secure channels. That way, we can ensure this isn't some kind of scam and protect ourselves from any potential issues.

Absolutely, Grandpa. Taking precautions is wise. Please do your checks now and feel free to reach back out through verified means once you're confident. But I must stress the urgency; time is ticking here. Once you confirm my details with the IRS, let's move swiftly to resolve this situation before any serious complications arise.
Feel free to take all necessary steps for safety and verification at your pace. I'll be waiting for your call back whenever you've completed these checks. Take care and stay safe in the meantime.

Thank you for understanding, we will proceed with caution as advised. We'll contact the IRS directly using their official number to verify everything before doing anything else.
Hold on a moment while I find that information online with my wife's help. We appreciate your advice and want to make sure we handle this correctly.

Of course, Grandpa. Take all necessary steps to ensure everything is proper and secure. Once you've verified through official channels, please reach out again so we can address the tax issue without delay. Remember, swift action now could prevent significant problems later on.
Take your time and stay safe. I'll be here when you're ready to proceed further.

We will do just that and get back to you once we have everything checked out properly. Thanks for your patience and guidance. We'll make sure to contact the IRS right away using their official number.
Could you please provide us with that secure IRS phone number or website so we can verify your claim? That would be a great help in ensuring we proceed correctly.
(We appreciate your understanding, but safety first.)

Certainly, Grandpa. The best way to reach the IRS directly is through their official website at irs.gov. From there, you can find the correct contact information and secure phone numbers specifically for resolving tax issues like this one.
Once you've reviewed this information and confirmed my identity, we'll need to move forward quickly on clearing any outstanding balances or issues on your granddad's account. Remember, swift action is crucial in preventing further complications.
Please proceed with verification now using official IRS resources and feel free to reach out once completed. I'm here when you're ready to address this matter thoroughly. Stay safe and take care while conducting these checks.

Thank you for the information. We'll visit irs.gov right away to confirm everything. Once we've verified your identity and the details of this supposed tax issue, we'll be back in touch about the next steps.
For now, it's best if we proceed cautiously and make sure that all dealings are through official channels.
We appreciate your patience and understanding.

That's wise, Grandpa. Proceeding with caution is always a good idea. Once you've verified everything on irs.gov and feel confident about the next steps, please reach out again. We can then finalize any necessary actions to resolve this matter promptly and correctly.
Take your time, stay safe, and verify all information carefully. I'll be here when you're ready to move forward. If you have any questions along the way, don't hesitate to contact me back through verified means.

Thank you again for your guidance and patience. We will check irs.gov right now to ensure everything is accurate before contacting you back.
We'll review all necessary details thoroughly and confirm if this is indeed an issue that needs immediate attention. Once we have a clear understanding, we'll reach out with any further questions or proceed as needed.
For now, it's best for us to double-check every detail ourselves. We appreciate your advice and will follow up once we've completed our verification process.

You're welcome, Grandpa. Taking the time to verify everything is the right approach. Once you have all your facts from irs.gov, feel free to reach out again whenever you're ready. We can then take the necessary actions to resolve any issues swiftly and appropriately.
Take care while verifying and stay safe throughout this process. I'll be here when you need further assistance or to proceed with resolving the matter.

We will do just that and contact you back once we have everything verified from irs.gov. Thank you for your continued support and patience.
For now, it's best if we take our time and make sure all our steps are correct. We'll be in touch when we're ready to proceed further.
Take care!

You're welcome, Grandpa. Take all the time you need to verify everything thoroughly. Once you're ready, feel free to reach out again for any assistance or to move forward with resolving this matter. Stay safe and take care until then.

Thank you, we will do that. We appreciate your help and understanding.
Take care!
You're welcome, Grandpa. Take care and stay safe. I'll be here when you're ready to proceed further.
Thanks again. We'll make sure to contact you once everything is verified from the official IRS website. Stay safe as well!
